# BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator (BBWPC)

![bedrijfsbodembaterplan_rgb](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37927107/139035649-5244795c-6687-42a5-a15d-169a54050903.png)

bedrijfsbodembaterplan_rgb

`BBWPC` is an R package that can be used to calculate the opportunities
and suitability of agronomic measures using individual field properties.
It is the calculating engine for the BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan (BBWP). BBWP
is a tool used by farmers and advisors in The Netherlands to recommend
field specific agronomic measures focusing on the improvement of soil
health, the reduction of nutrient losses to groundwater and surface
water and the water retention. Learn more about the
BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan at
[bedrijfsbodemwaterplan.nl](https://bedrijfsbodemwaterplan.nl).

## Installation

`BBWPC` can be installed from GitHub using `remotes`. This will install
the current development version from master branch. Stable versions can
found at `releases`.

    remotes::install_github("nmi-agro/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator")
    library("BBWPC")

## Documentation

Documentation of the R functions in the `BBWPC` package can be found
[here](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/)

![Logo of
NMI](https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEYGcm4HjNnxA/company-logo_200_200/0?e=2159024400&v=beta&t=u40rJ7bixPWB2SAqaj3KCKzJRoKcqf0wUXCdmsTDQvw)

Logo of NMI

# Package index

## All functions

- [`bbwp()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp.md)
  : Calculate the BBWP scores on field and farm level
- [`bbwp_calc_psp()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_calc_psp.md)
  : Calculate the precipitation surplus
- [`bbwp_check_meas()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_check_meas.md)
  : Helper function to check, update and extend the table with
  measurements
- [`bbwp_farm_score()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_farm_score.md)
  : Calculate the total score of five opportunity indicators for all
  fields in the Netherlands
- [`bbwp_field_indicators()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_field_indicators.md)
  : Calculate five risk or opportunity indicators for an agricultural
  field
- [`bbwp_field_properties()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_field_properties.md)
  : Calculate the relative impact of field properties given its position
  in the landscape
- [`bbwp_field_scores()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_field_scores.md)
  : Calculate the total score of five opportunity indicators for all
  fields in the Netherlands
- [`bbwp_format_aer()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_format_aer.md)
  : Convert possible B_AER_CBS values to standardized values
- [`bbwp_format_sc_wenr()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_format_sc_wenr.md)
  : Convert possible B_SC_WENR values to standardized values
- [`bbwp_lsw_properties()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_lsw_properties.md)
  : Create the LSW data.table from regional soil properties per Local
  Surface Water or any Regional Geometry
- [`bbwp_meas_rank()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_meas_rank.md)
  : Rank the suitability of agronomic measures to improve soil and water
  management for a given field
- [`bbwp_meas_score()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_meas_score.md)
  : Evaluate the contribution of agronomic measures to improve soil mand
  water management
- [`bbwp_measures`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_measures.md)
  : Agronomic measures that can be applied
- [`bbwp_parms`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_parms.md)
  : A table with the BBWP parameters
- [`bbwp_wat_groundwater_recharge()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/bbwp_wat_groundwater_recharge.md)
  : Function to calculate and evaluate the groundwater recharge in view
  of the soils' function to retain water
- [`cdf_rank()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/cdf_rank.md)
  : Calculate the chance that soil property is lower than the measured
  value given the variation in a catchment
- [`ecoregeling()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/ecoregeling.md)
  : Calculate the Ecoregeling scores on field and farm level
- [`er_aer_reward`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_aer_reward.md)
  : An overview of correction factors per economic agricultural area
- [`er_croprotation()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_croprotation.md)
  : Calculate the crop rotation based total score for five opportunity
  indicators
- [`er_crops`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_crops.md)
  : An overview of crop lists used in Ecoregelingen
- [`er_farm_aim()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_farm_aim.md)
  : Calculate the minimum required Ecoregelingen Scores on Farm level
- [`er_farm_measure`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_farm_measure.md)
  : The impact score of farm based measures
- [`er_farm_score()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_farm_score.md)
  : Calculate the total EcoRegelingen score of five opportunity
  indicators
- [`er_field_scores()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_field_scores.md)
  : Calculate the total score of five opportunity indicators conform
  Ecoregelingen Scoring
- [`er_meas_rank()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_meas_rank.md)
  : Rank the suitability of agronomic measures to improve soil, climate,
  biodiversity and water management for a given field
- [`er_meas_score()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_meas_score.md)
  : Evaluate the contribution of agronomic measures to improve soil and
  water management
- [`er_measures`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_measures.md)
  : The applicability of Ecoregeling Measures per crop type
- [`er_medal()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_medal.md)
  : Calculate the Medal on Field and Farm level
- [`er_opi()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_opi.md)
  : Calculate the Opportunity Index for the Ecoregeling method
- [`er_pdf()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_pdf.md)
  : Make table of measures that generated scores
- [`er_scoring`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/er_scoring.md)
  : The importance and scoring of environmental challenges for
  Ecoregelingen
- [`wf()`](https://nmi-agro.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/reference/wf.md)
  : Helper function to weight and correct the risk and scores
